'''Goldcloak''' may refer to:
#[[City Watch]]: The goldcloaks of King's Landing.
#[[Janos Slynt]]: [[Lord Commander]] of the City Watch.
#[[Goldcloak 1 (Lord Snow)]]: A Goldcloak who apprehends [[Catelyn Stark]] on her arrival in [[King's Landing]].
#[[Goldcloak 2 (Lord Snow)]]: A Goldcloak who apprehends Catelyn Stark on her arrival in King's Landing.
#[[Goldcloak 1 (The Wolf and the Lion)]]: A Goldcloak who blocks [[Arya Stark]]'s re-entry to the [[Red Keep]].
#[[Goldcloak 2 (The Wolf and the Lion)]]: A Goldcloak who blocks Arya Stark's re-entry to the Red Keep.
